Windlord:

"My love"thought Windlord hoping that Emphaht read his mind"Doesn't 
you like up set Hydras, what other thing could up set him a lot than 
we rescue one if his prisioners...?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" 
<cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Empath::
> 
> "Some plan," the femme snorts, her combative Predacon nature 
getting 
> the better of her.  "We risk a half-dozen or so units to save 
one?  
> That would seem to fall under the category of wasteful actions, 
> Katya - not to mention poor strategy."  Empath is deliberately 
> baiting the Clan warrior by using her own principles against her.  
> She has no doubt Katya will come up with a counter-argument.  
Whether 
> that rebuttal will be verbal or physical is another matter.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > 
> > : : Kup : :
> > Kup nodded as Katya explained.
> > Kup: That's the plan, and we've selected you lucky *cough* few 
to 
> help.
> >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:Katya 
> stepped up and stood proud.
> > 
> > Katya: As you all know, Ragnar and I are not Transformers but 
humans
> > stock into mech bodies. We do not come from here. In fact, there 
> might
> > be a possibility for us to go back to where we come from, but 
there 
> is
> > one problem. We were not alone.
> > 
> > She pauses, then continues.
> > 
> > Katya: Vladimir Ward, Khan of Clan Wolf, is here too. We have 
> located
> > him in the Predacon base as a prisoner. It is unthinkable to 
leave
> > this place without him. Thus, Kup and I have planned to raid the 
> base
> > and extract Khan Ward. That is the situation.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
> > <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > "Better get to the point," Empath growls as she takes a

> > > got better things to do with my time than participate in some

> > > brained rescue operation."
> > > 
> > > Wheeljack scrambles to his feet and hops into the nearest 
empty 
> chair.

> > > > Katya: I think we are all here.

an

mode 
> in 
> > > mid-
> > > > > trip, the white-and-grey Autobot flips himself so he goes 
> over 
> > > the 
> > > > > table instead of into it.  His every movement seems 
graceful -
>

> > > > > he does a classic spread-eagle faceplant on the other side 
of
